Description:
Set in Alaminos, 19 km from Cyprus Casinos - Larnaca Airport, ROBINSON Cyprus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel has an indoor pool, sauna, nightclub and a shared lounge.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk and a TV. The rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature sea views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. At ROBINSON Cyprus you will find a restaurant serving German, local and European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

The accommodation offers a childrens playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling.

Speaking German, Greek and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area.

Hala Sultan Tekke is 21 km from ROBINSON Cyprus, while Larnaca Salt Lake is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Larnaca International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

Description:
This holiday village is nestled between the slopes of the Five-Finger mountain range and the Mediterranean coastline. It is located roughly 9 km west of Kyrenia, which is the most popular tourist resort on the northern part of the island. Camelot beach is around 300 m from the holiday village. Ercan airport is also only 30 km away and Larnaca international airport is approximately 65 km from the holiday village.

This attractive holiday village consists of blocks of 2 floor buildings set in spacious grounds around an outdoor swimming pool. It has 46 rooms. Stylishly furnished, the air-conditioned holiday village offers guests a range of facilities which include a lobby which offers a 24-hour reception and 24-hour check-out service as well as a hotel safe and currency exchange facilities. Younger guests will enjoy the children's playground. Guests can have a drink at the bar and dine in the restaurant which serves international and Turkish cuisine. For an additional fee, guests can take advantage of wireless Internet access as well as room and laundry services. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.

All rooms come with a shower and hairdryer and guests can enjoy a good night's rest in their double or king-size bed. Rooms also come equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access, a safe, kitchen and minibar as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Individually regulated air conditioning and individually regulated heating are standard features of all accommodation. All rooms have pool views with private balconies or terraces. The luxurious and comfortable furniture is designed to make guests feel at home.
